description: An object that serves as registration for a Synapse user to receive events for the specified event.

id.description: The ID associated with the Webhook. This field is issued by Synapse and cannot be changed by the user.

createdBy.description: The ID of the user that created this webhook.

createdOn.description: The date this webhook was created.

modifiedOn.description: The date this webhook was last modified.

objectId.description: The ID of the Synapse object to receive events of. The objectId will be required by the user at create/update.

objectType.description: Which type of Synapse object is associated with the Webhook. The objectType will be required by the user at create/update.

eventTypes.description: The set of event types to subscribe to.

invokeEndpoint.description: The endpoint the Synapse user would like the webhook events sent to on invocation. Must be 255 Characters or less. The invokeEndpoint will be required by the user at create/update.

isEnabled.description: True if the Synapse user has selected to receive events. If the user sets to false, events will be temporalily paused. This field will default to true unless otherwise specified by the user.

verificationStatus.description: The verification status, until VERIFIED the webhook won't receive synapse events. Only a verification event will be received by the webhook.

verificationMsg.description: A message describing the reason of the verification status
